law.text: The partnership agreement may grant to all, or certain identified general partners or a specified class or group of the general partners, the right to vote on a per capita or any other basis, separately or with all or any class or group of the limited partners or the general partners, on any matter and may make appropriate provision for the exercise of such voting rights.
law.history: Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 284, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1988.
